sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Link } from 'react-router-dom';
import { Box, Container, Typography, Button, Grid, Card, CardContent, CardMedia, CardActions } from '@mui/material';
import './HomePage.css'; // Ensure you style appropriately
import campusImage from '../assets/campus.jpg'; // Use the image you uploaded

const HomePage = () => {
  return (
    <Box>
      {/* Hero Section */}
      <Box sx={{ bgcolor: '#007bff', color: 'white', py: 8, mb: 4 }}>
        <Container>
          <Typography variant="h2" component="h1" gutterBottom>
            Welcome to CampusLink
          </Typography>
          <Typography variant="h5" color="inherit" paragraph>
            Your gateway to campus life
          </Typography>
          <Button
            component={Link}
            to="/login"
            variant="contained"
            color="inherit"
            size="large"
          >
            Login
          </Button>
        </Container>
      </Box>

      {/* Quick Actions */}
      <Container sx={{ py: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom>
          Quick Actions
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/student-portal.jpg"
                alt="Student Portal"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Student Portal
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Access your academic records and resources
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Enter
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/faculty-portal.jpg"
                alt="Faculty Portal"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Faculty Portal
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Manage courses and student records
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Enter
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/department-portal.jpg"
                alt="Department Portal"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Department Portal
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Department-specific resources and information
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Enter
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/events.jpg"
                alt="Events"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Events
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  View and register for campus events
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Enter
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* Campus Statistics */}
      <Container sx={{ py: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom>
          Campus Statistics
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h3" component="h3" align="center">
                  5,000+
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary" align="center">
                  Students
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h3" component="h3" align="center">
                  150+
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary" align="center">
                  Courses
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h3" component="h3" align="center">
                  50+
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary" align="center">
                  Research Projects
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={3}>
            <Card>
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h3" component="h3" align="center">
                  10+
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary" align="center">
                  Departments
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>

      {/* Campus Services */}
      <Container sx={{ py: 4 }}>
        <Typography variant="h4" component="h2" gutterBottom>
          Campus Services
        </Typography>
        <Grid container spacing={4}>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/admissions.jpg"
                alt="Admissions"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Admissions
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Apply for admission and check status
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Learn More
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/academic-records.jpg"
                alt="Academic Records"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Academic Records
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  View and manage your academic records
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Learn More
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
            <Card>
              <CardMedia
                component="img"
                height="140"
                image="/images/campus-events.jpg"
                alt="Campus Events"
              />
              <CardContent>
                <Typography variant="h5" component="h3">
                  Campus Events
                </Typography>
                <Typography color="text.secondary">
                  Stay updated with campus activities
                </Typography>
              </CardContent>
              <CardActions>
                <Button 
                  component={Link} 
                  to="/login"
                  size="small"
                >
                  Learn More
                </Button>
              </CardActions>
            </Card>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
};

const buttonStyle = {
  padding: '0.8rem 2rem',
  marginRight: '1rem',
  backgroundColor: '#ff4d4f',
  color: '#fff',
  textDecoration: 'none',
  borderRadius: '8px',
  fontSize: '1rem',
};

export default HomePage;
